Interface ViewInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
GUIViewInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
GUIView, View
public interface ViewInterface
Interface for the View. The view handles user interface elements and presentation logic. This interface contains the common functionality between the command-line user interface and the GUI.

  • Method Details

    • examineComposition

      void examineComposition​(InflexiblePortfolio p)
      Prints the portfolio name, and lists each stock and the amount of that stock in the portfolio.
      Parameters:
      p - the name of the portfolio

    • showTickerMatches

      void showTickerMatches​(String csvContents)
      The user can look up ticker symbols that match the name of a company, or all ticker symbols that start with the inputted string. Else where the program will query Alpha Vantage for a list of matching results. This method will display the top ticker symbols output by Alpha Vantage.
      Parameters:
      csvContents - data in csv format of the ticker symbol matches for a user query. The columns output by Alpha Vantage are symbol, name, type, region, marketOpen, marketClose, timezone, currency, and matchScore.

    • displayPortfolioValue

      void displayPortfolioValue​(String portfolioName, String date, float value)
      Prints the name of a portfolio and its value on a certain date, and prints the date.
      Parameters:
      portfolioName - the name of the portfolio that the list command was run on.
      date - the date that the value of the portfolio was determined for. MM/DD/YYYY format.
      value - the total value of the portfolio.

    • showCrossovers

      void showCrossovers​(String results)
      Takes a string containing the crossover results from the controller and prints it in a user-friendly format.
      Parameters:
      results - the crossover results from the model

    • displayTotalCostBasis

      void displayTotalCostBasis​(String portfolioName, float totalCostBasis)
      Display the total cost basis for a portfolio.
      Parameters:
      portfolioName - The name of the portfolio.
      totalCostBasis - The total cost basis for the portfolio.

    • displayPortfolioValueOnDate

      void displayPortfolioValueOnDate​(String portfolioName, String date, float portfolioValue)
      Display the portfolio value on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      portfolioName - The name of the portfolio.
      date - The date for which the portfolio value is calculated.
      portfolioValue - The total value of the portfolio on the specified date.

    • printMenu

      void printMenu()
      Prints the menu of possible options.

    • errorMessage

      void errorMessage​(String message)
      Displays the given error message to the user.
      Parameters:
      message - the desired error message.

    • showMessage

      void showMessage​(String message)
      Displays a popup window with the given message.
      Parameters:
      message - the text contents of the popup window to be created.
